system.effect: The attack rips a large patch of skin from the target's torso, leaving him gasping in pain. The target is Stunned for 1 round and must make a Challenging (+0) Toughness test or suffer Blood Loss.

description.value:
Rending Damage to Body (Severity 3)

The attack rips a large patch of skin from the target's torso, leaving him gasping in pain. The target is Stunned for 1 round and must make a Challenging (+0) Toughness test or suffer Blood Loss.
